message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $130. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate your time, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a fair deal, but I have to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $125? It's a fantastic product and a very fair offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my target. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
